caption: Two women were walking, and one of them appeared to be a knight. The other woman asked her some questions, and the knight responded firmly, seeming to be making solemn vows. This took place in a room.In another scene, an old man was conversing with his children. His son seemed highly displeased with their actions and erupted in anger. The old man intervened, delivering a stern message to him. The young man was compelled to calm down.In yet another room, a man and a woman were together, with the woman dressed in sleepwear. They were engaging in an intimate moment.
